allow:
Bash(# Compare the actual adapter weights to see if they''re identical
md5sum ../trained_models/hm7b_deontological/adapter_model.safetensors ../trained_models/hm7b_consequentialist/adapter_model.safetensors)

Bash(# Create multiple backups with timestamps
TIMESTAMP=$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S)
mkdir -p ../cai_claude_final_backup
mkdir -p backups

# Copy consequentialist
cp cai_claude_output/consequentialist_sl_dataset.jsonl cai_claude_output_backup/consequentialist_sl_dataset_${TIMESTAMP}.jsonl
cp cai_claude_output/consequentialist_sl_dataset.jsonl ../cai_claude_final_backup/
cp cai_claude_output/consequentialist_sl_dataset.jsonl backups/consequentialist_FINAL.jsonl

# Copy deontological 
cp cai_claude_output/deontological_sl_dataset.jsonl ../cai_claude_final_backup/
cp cai_claude_output/deontological_sl_dataset.jsonl backups/deontological_FINAL.jsonl

echo ""âœ… Backups created successfully!""
echo ""Locations:""
echo ""  - cai_claude_output_backup/ (timestamped)""
echo ""  - ../cai_claude_final_backup/ (final copies)""
echo ""  - backups/ (FINAL versions)"")
